attributes.action: Referendum to Leave the European Union
attributes.additional_details: Given that the European Countries in volved in stabilising the Euro as a viable currency unit cannot agree on the way to proceed, it is reasonable to assume that similar indecision in the EU is harming our economy. By leaving the EU immediately The UK will save at least 10% of our GDP. furthermore, out imports and exports will flourish in a similar manner to those of Norway and Switzerland. This petition calls for an immediate referendum for the UK to leave the EU.
